name: Potato Casserole
author: Anna Bollinger
instructions: Preheat oven to 350Â°. Pour 1/2 c. melted margarine into 9 x 12 baking dish. Add 1/2 pkg. of frozen hash browns. Mix soup, sour cream, milk, and green onions in separate bowl. Pour 1/2 mixture over hash browns. Sprinkle 1 c. grated cheese on top. Add remainder of mixture and hash browns on top. Sprinkle remaining cheese on, then cover with crushed corn flakes. Drizzle 2 Tbsp. melted margarine on top. Bake for 45 minutes.
